tau_syn.description: Array of synaptic time constants for each receptor type

U.description: Parameter determining the increase in u with each spike

x.description: Initial fraction of synaptic vesicles in the readily releasable pool

y.description: Initial fraction of synaptic vesicles in the synaptic cleft

u.description: Initial release probability of synaptic vesicles

tau_syn_in.description: Time constant of postsynaptic inhibitory currents

with_reset.description: Should the membrane potential be reset after a spike?

c_2.description: Prefactor of exponential part of transfer function

c_3.description: Coefficient of exponential non-linearity of transfer function

q_sfa.description: Values added to spike-frequency adaptation (sfa) after each spike emission
